src: ድሕሪ እቲ ብሰሉስ ናይ 25 ደቓይቅ ኣብ PMO ምስ ሓላፊ NDP ጃክ ለይተን ዝተገብረ ኣኼባ፣ ጠቅላይ ሚኒስተር ስቲፈን ሃርፐር ነቲ ናይ መንግስቲ ‘ጽሩይ ኣየር ኣንቐጽ’ ቅድሚ ካልኣይ ንባቡ ናብ ሓደ ሓባራዊ ፓርቲ ኮሚተ ንኽጻረ ክሰዶ ተሰማሚዑ ኣሎ።
mt: 25-year-old PMO employee Jak Leyte was killed in a car accident while driving to the NDP headquarters, where he was to meet with Prime Minister Stefan Harper, who was to discuss the party's upcoming election.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: ላይቶን ምስቲ ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ኣብ ዝተራኸበሉ እዋን እቲ ብዛዕባ ከባቢያዊ ዝተመልከተ ረቒቕ ሕጊ ንክቕየርን ናይቶም ኮንሰርቫቲቭ ዝነበረ" ሕጊ ውድቂ ተገይሩ ከም ብሓዱሽ ንክፅሓፍ" ነቶም ኮንሰርቫቲቭ ሓቲትዎም፡፡
mt: The former prime minister, who was in the country for a visit, was among those who were injured in the explosion, according to the country's state news agency.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: እቲ ፈደራል መንግስቲ ነቲ ምወላ ናይ'ቲ ኣብ ዴቮንፖርት፣ ታዝሜንያ ዝርከብ መርሲ ሆስፒታል ካብ ዝቆጻጸሮ ኣትሒዙ፣ እቲ ሃገራዊ መንግስቲን ገለ ፈደራል ኣባላት ፓርላማን ነዚ ግብሪ ከም ተዋስኦ ንስም እቲ ኣብ ሕዳር ዝቀራረብ ዘሎ ፈደራላዊ ምርጫ እዩ ክብሉ ነቐፌታ ሂቦም።
mt: The government of the Democratic Republic of the Congo has postponed the parliamentary elections scheduled for December 2018, citing logistical problems.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: ኮይኑ ግና ቀዳማይ ሚኒስተር ጆን ሃዋርድ እቲ ተግባር ተወሳኺ ናይ 45 ሚልዮን ናይ ኣዉስትራልያ ዶላር ብምሃብ ናይ ሕክምና መገልገሊታት ኣብ ታስማንያ መንግስቲ ምንካይ ንምሕላው ጥራይ ዝተገበረ ከምዝኮነ ተዛሪቦም።
mt: 45 million dollars was spent on the project, which was the largest in the history of the Ministry of Health.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: ከምቲ ናይ ቀረባ ሓበሬታት ናይ መጠን ባሕሪምንባባት ሱናሚከልዕል ከምዝክእል ይሕብር። ኣብ ጥቓ ፓጎ ፓጎን ኒውንን ናይ ሱናሚ ምልክታት ከምዝነበረ የርኢ።
